`,(0,u.jsxDEV)(a.pre,{children:(0,u.jsxDEV)(a.code,{className:"language-tsx:_app.tsx",children:`useEffect(() => {\r
  const handleStart = (url: string) => {\r
    NProgress.start();\r
  };\r
\r
  const handleStop = () => {\r
    NProgress.done();\r
  };\r
\r
  router.events.on('routeChangeStart', handleStart);\r
  router.events.on('routeChangeComplete', handleStop);\r
  router.events.on('routeChangeError', handleStop);\r
\r
  return () => {\r
    router.events.off('routeChangeStart', handleStart);\r
    router.events.off('routeChangeComplete', handleStop);\r
    router.events.off('routeChangeError', handleStop);\r
  };\r
}, [router]);

`,(0,u.jsxDEV)(a.pre,{children:(0,u.jsxDEV)(a.code,{className:"language-css:global.css",children:`/* nprogress */\r
:root {\r
  --nprogress-color: rgb(168 85 247);\r
}\r
\r
#nprogress .bar {\r
  background: var(--nprogress-color) !important;\r
  padding: 0 10px !important;\r
  height: 3px !important;\r
}\r
\r
#nprogress .spinner .spinner-icon {\r
  border-top-color: var(--nprogress-color) !important;\r
  border-left-color: var(--nprogress-color) !important;\r
}
